auth.loginSubtitle: Sign in to your account to continue
auth.registerSubtitle: Join us to start your journey to mental wellness
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

mentalBox.title: Mental Box
mentalBox.subtitle: Store your worries and problems here
mentalBox.description: Write down what's bothering you and put it away for later
mentalBox.addEntryDescription: Write down what's on your mind and store it in your mental box
mentalBox.emptyDescription: Start by adding your first worry or problem
mentalBox.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
mentalBox.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this entry? This action cannot be undone.

moodTracker.title: Mood Tracker
moodTracker.subtitle: Track your mood and stress levels
moodTracker.description: Monitor how you're feeling throughout the day
moodTracker.selectMoodBelow: Select your mood and stress level below
moodTracker.notePlaceholder: What's on your mind? What helped today?
moodTracker.startTracking: Start tracking your mood to see patterns over time

grounding.title: Grounding Techniques
grounding.subtitle: Breathing exercises to calm your mind
grounding.description: Use these techniques when you feel anxious or overwhelmed
grounding.breathingDescription: A simple breathing technique to reduce anxiety
grounding.step1: Breathe in through your nose for 4 seconds
grounding.step3: Exhale slowly through your mouth for 8 seconds

dashboard.subtitle: How are you feeling today?
dashboard.noScheduleToday: No worry windows scheduled for today

errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.maxLength: Must be no more than {{max}} characters

stressReframe.title: Stress Reframing
stressReframe.subtitle: Transform your stressful thoughts with AI-powered cognitive reframing
stressReframe.thoughtDescription: Type any thought that's causing you stress or anxiety
stressReframe.placeholder: Example: I'm going to fail this presentation...
stressReframe.example: Be honest and specific for best results
stressReframe.enterThought: Please enter a thought to reframe
stressReframe.tooLong: Thought is too long. Please keep it under 1000 characters
stressReframe.stoicDesc: Focus on what you can control
stressReframe.optimistDesc: Find the opportunity in the situation
